exposurecontrol: i Auto, P: Program AE (Program shift can be performed), A: Aperture priority AE, S: Shutter priority AE, M: Manual, Bulb, Time, Scene select AE, Art Filter, Underwater wide / macro* * Selectable from menu as a function on Fn-1/Rec button
flashtype: TTL flash,GN=7(ISO100.m) / GN=10 (ISO200.m) * Attach it on the hot shoe and connect it to the accessory port 2. Available on FL-LM1/2.
isosensitivity: AUTO ISO L - 1600 (Default), upper limit customize available 200 - 25600, Manual ISO L - 200 - 25600, 1/3 or 1 EV steps selectable
flashmode: Flash Auto, Redeye, Fill-in, Flash Off, Red-eye Slow sync.(1st curtain), Slow sync.(1st curtain), Slow sync.(2nd curtain), Manual 1/1 FULL 1/64
imagestabilization: Built-in (Image sensor shift type for movie & still, 5-axis* image stabilization) * yaw/pitch/vertical shift/horizontal shift/rolling
liveviewfunction: Type: Image Sensor type Field of view: Approx. 100% Display Mode: Normal Mode, Histogram Mode, Level gauge, Highlight and shadow, Off Magnification Ratio: x5, x7, x10 (Default), x14 Monitor information: Aperture value, Shutter speed, Auto Bracket, AE Lock, AF mode, IS, Shooting Mode, Battery Check, Myset, Internal Temperature Warning, Face / Eye Detection, Histogram, Number of storable still pictures, Record mode, ISO, Sequential shooting, Self-timer, White Balance, Metering Mode, AF confirmation mark, Exposure Compensation Value, Spot metering Area Flash Mode, Flash Status, Flash intensity Control, Super FP, Focal length, Tone control, Eye-Fi condition, Digital teleconverter, Battery check Display of Face Detection: Max 8 frames of face detection can be displayed. Live View Close Up Mode: Available at HDR1 and HDR2 shooting
imagetype: RAW (12-bit lossless compression), JPEG, RAW+JPEG, MPO(3D still)
selftimer: Operation time: 12 sec., 2 sec.,custom (Waiting time 1-30sec.,Shooting interval 0.5/1/2/3sec.,Number of shots 1-10)
magnification: Approx. 100% / Approx. 1.30x*1 - 1.48x*2 (-1m-1, 50mm lens, Infinity) *1: at Finder Style 1, 2 (aspect 4:3) *2: at Finder Style 3 (aspect 4:3)
playback: Single-frame, Information display, Index display (4/9/25/100 frames), Calendar, Enlargement (2x - 14x), Movie (with sound, FF/REW/Pause), Picture rotation (auto), Slideshow *(with BGM/BGM+Sound/Sound) * Slideshow : Still/Movie/Still+Movie, When a camera is connected to HDTV with HDMI cable, 2 new slideshow effect can be selectable.(Still) 1 BGM replaceable. Auto angle correction
focusingpointselection: 81-area multiple AF (Contrast detection AF), 37-area multiple AF (Phase-difference detection AF) All target, Group target area (3x3-area),  Single target(Standard Target Size/Small Target Size)
aelock: Locked at 1st release of shutter button (can be set to Fn1/Rec button)
flashexposurecompensation: Up to +/-3 EV in 0.3, 0.5, 1 EV steps selectable
dustcleaningsystem: Supersonic Wave Filter (dust reduction system for image sensor)
dioptricadjustment: Approx. 21mm (-1m-1, Distance from rear lens surface) / -4 ~ +2m-1
scenemodes: Portrait, e-Portrait, Landscape, Landscape + Portrait, Sport, Night, Night + Portrait, Children, High Key, Low Key, DIS mode, Macro, Nature Macro, Candle, Sunset, Documents, Panorama, Fireworks, Beach & Snow, Fisheye Conv., Wide Conv., Macro Conv., 3D* *3D lens(H-FT012 by Panasonic) only, still only
meteringsystem: Digital ESP metering (324-area multi pattern metering), Center weighted average metering, Spot metering, Spot metering with highlight control, Spot metering with shadow control
focustype: High-speed imager AF (Contrast detection / On-Chip Phase-difference detection)
shutterspeed: 1/8000 - 60 sec. (1/3, 1/2, or 1EV steps selectable) Bulb/Time: default setting 8min. (1/2/4/8/15/20/25/30 min. selectable)
fileformat: DCF, DPOF compatible / Exif, PRINT Image Matching III, MPO compatible
depthoffieldpreview: Available with Live Preview function button
resolution: [RAW] 4608 x 3456 pixels [JPEG] 4608 x 3456 pixels - 640 x 480 pixels
focusingmodes: Single AF (S-AF) / Continuous AF (C-AF) / Manual Focus (MF) / S-AF + MF / AF tracking (C-AF + TR)
